labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gaypornhdfree.com/nikita-repa-spanking-2/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>So gaypornhdfree.com is no longer detecting my adgaurd premium at all it’s working perfectly however some videos have been blocked I assume it’s because some of the embedded videos from dood.re which are being on gaypornhdfree inspect element have embedded ads so adguard I assume is not being able to distinguish the two and is mistaking the embedded video with the embedded ads as an ad it’s self. Is there anyway this can be resolved of separating the line of code of the ads and the line of code that make up the video so only the line of code that makes up the ads is blocked so that I can still view the video?2. 


Here is video url links to certain videos on gaypornhdfree.com that I have no access to as long as adguard keeps blocking them as ads 


https://gaypornhdfree.com/giuspel-favio-vador-behind-the-scenes-in-the-park/


https://gaypornhdfree.com/ethan-chase-ridick/


https://gaypornhdfree.com/nikita-repa-spanking-2/






Part of me is worried if any of you attempt this could it jeopardize what has already been in state of gaypornhdfree no longer detecting my adblocker???

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![C2E79D47-ED34-478B-BE50-999C915A7E7C](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118444664/209419496-5f681322-8843-4843-a123-bb40dda36eae.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Sadly not :(
> 
> Currently there is a 40% discount on licenses (up to 3 devices) on our website. In iOS app (not the Pro one) you can use your account login to get same elements
> 
> If you do, do not forget to cancel appstore's subscription. You may contact our support team via inbuilt support menu. Maybe they can help a bit though.
> 
> You do not need to remove a rule. The rule is getting removed automatically when you update filters.

Also my friend thinks you guys help premium and free users on issue tickets at same level I think he’s wrong paid users are seen first before free or is he right?

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gaypornhdfree.com/nikita-repa-spanking-2/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>So gaypornhdfree.com is no longer detecting my adgaurd premium at all it’s working perfectly however some videos have been blocked I assume it’s because some of the embedded videos from dood.re which are being on gaypornhdfree inspect element have embedded ads so adguard I assume is not being able to distinguish the two and is mistaking the embedded video with the embedded ads as an ad it’s self. Is there anyway this can be resolved of separating the line of code of the ads and the line of code that make up the video so only the line of code that makes up the ads is blocked so that I can still view the video?2. 


Here is video url links to certain videos on gaypornhdfree.com that I have no access to as long as adguard keeps blocking them as ads 


https://gaypornhdfree.com/giuspel-favio-vador-behind-the-scenes-in-the-park/


https://gaypornhdfree.com/ethan-chase-ridick/


https://gaypornhdfree.com/nikita-repa-spanking-2/






Part of me is worried if any of you attempt this could it jeopardize what has already been in state of gaypornhdfree no longer detecting my adblocker???

3. Screenshots

issue.title: Some videos are being mistaken as ads I assume because of the ads being embedded in some of the embedded videos

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gaypornhdfree.com/nikita-repa-spanking-2/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>So gaypornhdfree.com is no longer detecting my adgaurd premium at all it’s working perfectly however some videos have been blocked I assume it’s because some of the embedded videos from dood.re which are being on gaypornhdfree inspect element have embedded ads so adguard I assume is not being able to distinguish the two and is mistaking the embedded video with the embedded ads as an ad it’s self. Is there anyway this can be resolved of separating the line of code of the ads and the line of code that make up the video so only the line of code that makes up the ads is blocked so that I can still view the video?2. 


Here is video url links to certain videos on gaypornhdfree.com that I have no access to as long as adguard keeps blocking them as ads 


https://gaypornhdfree.com/giuspel-favio-vador-behind-the-scenes-in-the-park/


https://gaypornhdfree.com/ethan-chase-ridick/


https://gaypornhdfree.com/nikita-repa-spanking-2/






Part of me is worried if any of you attempt this could it jeopardize what has already been in state of gaypornhdfree no longer detecting my adblocker???

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![C2E79D47-ED34-478B-BE50-999C915A7E7C](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118444664/209419496-5f681322-8843-4843-a123-bb40dda36eae.png)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Can check later if a javascript rule can be added to Auto-click some away (can take a while due to national  holidays though). This time the videos come from hqq instead of dood.

When I previously checked I only needed to click two times (and first one tells you if you misclick).

## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address ``` http://ikioi-ranking.com/v/twitch http://niconama.soraweb.net/ http://live-ranking.com/v/17live http://tiktoklive.soraweb.net/ http://showroom.soraweb.net/ http://linelive.soraweb.net/ http://peritter.com/?lang=ja https://youtubelive.soraweb.net/ ``` ### Add your comment and screenshots

comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -1946,6 +1946,7 @@ indiastudychannel.com#?##content_rightbar > div.roundedBlock:has(> div#HP-gpt-pa
 indiastudychannel.com#?##content_rightbar > div.roundedBlock:has(> div[id^="div-gpt-ad-"])
 !
 linuxadictos.com#?##content > aside[id^="text-"]:has(> div.textwidget > p.gt-block > ins.adsbygoogle)
+techpowerup.com#?#.v-port > div:has(>div > img[src*="/reviyuu"])
comment.body: Better `#?#.v-port > div:has(> a[rel="nofollow"][href^="/reviyuu/"])`. Make the depth as few as possible, i.e. (> * > *) => (> *). Also using src for :has is bit risky as the src may be removed from source code (https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/95975#issuecomment-961235146)
